Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Decoration, FarAwayItem, Platform

    public abstract class Tile
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Abstract class used to move all subclasses when we need to make it look like the hero is moving.
    Version:
    May 8, 2019
    Author:
    R. Gordon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveLeft(int speed)
      Move to left (to make hero look like they are moving right)
      void moveRight(int speed)
      Move to right (to make hero look like they are moving left)

        act, addedToWorld, getImage, getIntersectingObjects, getNeighbours, getObjectsAtOffset, getObjectsInRange, getOneIntersectingObject, getOneObjectAtOffset, getRotation, getWorld, getWorldOfType, getX, getY, intersects, isAtEdge, isTouching, move, removeTouching, setImage, setImage, setLocation, setRotation, turn, turnTowards

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
